meanings.definition: A person who quibbles over trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: The pettifoggers in the meeting kept arguing about the color of the walls.
meanings.sent2: The group of pettifoggers couldn't agree on the smallest details of the project.
meanings.sent3: The pettifoggers at the party debated for hours about the best way to cut a cake.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the pettifogger of the office, always nitpicking about office supplies.
meanings.sent5: The pettifoggers in the book club argued endlessly about the font size of the reading material.

meanings.definition: To argue or quibble over insignificant details.
meanings.sent1: Stop pettifogging and just make a decision already!
meanings.sent2: The siblings pettifogged over who should take out the trash.
meanings.sent3: The team pettifogged about the font style for the presentation slides.
meanings.sent4: She pettifogged with her friend over the best route to take for the road trip.
meanings.sent5: The students pettifogged about the due date of the assignment until the teacher intervened.
